name: gulp-img64
description: Convert and replace image-files within your DOM/HTML to base64-encoded data.
keywords: gulpplugin endoding base64 image html DOM
readme:
# gulp-img64 [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/247even/gulp-img64.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/247even/gulp-img64) ## Example #### `index.html` ```html
... ``` #### `helloworld.txt` ```html Hello World! ``` #### `gulpfile.js` ```js var gulp = require('gulp'); var img64 = require('gulp-img64'); gulp.task('default', function () { gulp.src('index.html') .pipe(img64()) .pipe(gulp.dest('path')); }); ``` #### `path/index.html` ```html Hello World! ... ``` ### License MIT Â© 247even
